TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含用於在 Windows 執行階段中之資料流與適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET 中之受控資料流之間轉換的擴充方法。

span.span: Contains extension methods for converting between streams in the Windows Runtime and managed streams in the .NET for Windows Store apps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有當您開發 Windows 市集應用程式時，可使用這些擴充方法。These extension methods are available only when you develop Windows Store apps. 這些方法會提供便利的方法，處理 Windows 市集應用程式中的資料流。The methods provide convenient ways of working with streams in Windows Store apps. 您未建立的執行個體`WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`類別; 相反地，您可以使用這些方法的執行個體並介面和類別。You do not create an instance of the `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class; instead, you use these methods from instances of the and interfaces and the class. `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`類別包含兩個方法來將 managed 類型轉換Windows 執行階段中的資料流的物件：The `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class contains two methods for converting a managed object to a stream in the Windows Runtime: - - `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`類別包含三個多載的方法，來轉換至 Windows 執行階段中的資料流物件：The `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class contains three overloaded methods for converting a stream in the Windows Runtime to a object: - - - 從.NET Framework 4.5.1 開始`WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`類別包含一個方法來將資料流轉換成 Windows 執行階段:Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.1, the `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class contains a method for converting a stream to a Windows Runtime : - ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用和 The following example shows how to use the and [!code-csharp[windowsruntimestreamextensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[windowsruntimestreamextensions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/vb/blankpage.xaml.vb#2)] 以下是前一個範例與相關聯的 XAML 程式碼。Here's the XAML code that is associated with the previous example. [!code-xaml[windowsruntimestreamextensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Storage.Streams.IInputStream AsInputStream (this System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Storage.Streams.IInputStream AsInputStream(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
static member AsInputStream : System.IO.Stream -> Windows.Storage.Streams.IInputStream

span.span: The stream to convert.

summary.span: 將適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET 中的受控資料流轉換成 Windows 執行階段中的輸入資料流。

span.span: Converts a managed stream in the .NET for Windows Store apps to an input stream in the Windows Runtime.

returns.span: 代表已轉換之資料流的 Windows 執行階段 物件。

span.span: A Windows Runtime object that represents the converted stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別 < System.IO.Stream > 執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`AsInputStream`和Windows 執行階段中的資料流來回轉換的 managed 資料流的方法。The following example shows how to use the `AsInputStream` and methods to convert a managed stream to and from a stream in the Windows Runtime. [!code-csharp[windowsruntimestreamextensions#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage2.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[windowsruntimestreamextensions#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/vb/blankpage2.xaml.vb#4)] 以下是前一個範例與相關聯的 XAML 程式碼。Here's the XAML code that is associated with the previous example. [!code-xaml[windowsruntimestreamextensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage2.xaml#3)]

span.span: is .
The stream does not support reading.

summary.span: 將 Windows 執行階段中的隨機存取資料流轉換成適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET 中的受控資料流。

span.span: Converts a random access stream in the Windows Runtime to a managed stream in the .NET for Windows Store apps.
The converted stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 轉換資料流時，會使用預設緩衝區大小為 16,384 個位元組。A default buffer size of 16,384 bytes is used when converting the stream. 若要指定不同的緩衝區大小，請使用多載。To specify a different buffer size, use the overload.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Stream AsStream (this Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream windowsRuntimeStream, int bufferSize);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream AsStream(class Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream windowsRuntimeStream, int32 bufferSize) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsStream (windowsRuntimeStream As IRandomAccessStream, bufferSize As Integer) As Stream
static member AsStream : Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream * int -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: windowsRuntimeStream
param.span: 要轉換的 Windows 執行階段 物件。

span.span: The Windows Runtime object to convert.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 緩衝區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the buffer.

param.span: 這個值不可以是負數，但可以是 0 (零)，以停用緩衝處理。

span.span: This value cannot be negative, but it can be 0 (zero) to disable buffering.

summary.span: 使用指定的緩衝區大小將 Windows 執行階段中的隨機存取資料流轉換成適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET 中的受控資料流。

span.span: Converts a random access stream in the Windows Runtime to a managed stream in the .NET for Windows Store apps using the specified buffer size.
The converted stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 您可以使用這個方法來轉換資料流時指定的緩衝區大小。You use this method to specify a buffer size when converting the stream. 若要使用 16,384 個位元組的預設緩衝區大小，請使用多載。To use the default buffer size of 16,384 bytes, use the overload. 在大部分情況下，緩衝處理，將可改善資料流作業的效能。In most situations, buffering improves the performance of stream operations. 您可以停用緩衝處理，藉由設定`bufferSize`為零，但您應該執行此動作僅在您確定停用緩衝處理，是適合您的情況。You can disable buffering by setting `bufferSize` to zero, but you should do this only when you are sure that disabling buffering is appropriate for your situation.

span.span: Converts an output stream in the Windows Runtime to a managed stream in the .NET for Windows Store apps using the specified buffer size.
The converted stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 您可以使用這個方法來轉換資料流時指定的緩衝區大小。You use this method to specify a buffer size when converting the stream. 若要使用 16,384 個位元組的預設緩衝區大小，請使用多載。To use the default buffer size of 16,384 bytes, use the overload. 在大部分情況下，緩衝處理，將可改善資料流作業的效能。In most situations, buffering improves the performance of stream operations. 您可以停用緩衝處理，藉由設定`bufferSize`為零，但您應該執行此動作僅在您確定停用緩衝處理，是適合您的情況。You can disable buffering by setting `bufferSize` to zero, but you should do this only when you are sure that disabling buffering is appropriate for your situation.

span.span: is .
is negative.
